body: Once per day, the rogue can roll two dice while making a Bluff check, and take the better result. She must choose to use this talent before making the Bluff check. A rogue can use this ability one additional time per day for every five rogue levels she possesses.
name: Honeyed Words
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Rogue/Rogue Talents/Honeyed Words
